product_name: Black Diamond Nitron Bent Gate Carabiner
long_description: The hot-forged Black Diamond Nitron Bent Gate carabiner features an ergonomic gate for easy clipping while climbing. Hot-forged gate has small ridges that give your fingers something to grip while clipping; keylock gate won't snag on protection, slings or bolt hangers. Hot-forging process allows the metal to be moved around and formed into intricate shapes; these shapes can ease handling and reduce weight. The Black Diamond Nitron Bent Gate carabiner works well on the rope-end of a quickdraw.
short_description: The hot-forged Black Diamond Nitron Bent Gate carabiner features an ergonomic gate for easy clipping while climbing.
